entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Fog patches dissipating this morning. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. High 13. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 5:30 AM EDT Tuesday 11 April 2023
